description: A near-flat curve with slight high-frequency enhancement for detail, aiming for a neutral and uncolored playback experience.

bands.notes: Neutral, preserving sub-bass information as recorded.
Very slight lift for foundational bass, often compensating for room acoustics or small speakers.
Neutral, crucial for the body and warmth of instruments.
The core reference frequency, kept strictly neutral.
Slight lift to gently enhance instrumental presence and attack.
Small boost to highlight clarity, definition, and articulation.
Gentle boost for treble sparkle and high-frequency detail, simulating a high-quality reference system.
Small boost for 'air' and openness, revealing high harmonics.
